name: nabeel84
text: Old Phillipe has hair by his ears but young Philippe has none. I don't know about otters, but apparently it takes longer than 5 years to grow hair.

name: internnumber1
text: Maybe otters only grow hair after living through years of deep, crippling shame.

name: spinynorman
text:
Or sudden deafness. Some sort of trauma, at least.

Otters are a strange breed.

name: charchar
text: Maybe he always had the hair, but when he's old his Mom can't trim it.

name: alejandroadam
text:
we've all been there.
still can't sleep with out peeing alittle.

name: jdhenry105
text: Does your house in the desert have high speed or dial-up?

name: alejandroadam
text:
I actually do live in a house in the desert....

not quite a hermit yet. but has nothing to do with wetting the bed. mostly just that my peoples are from here.

name: johnny_diamond
text: where is 'here'? it sounds awesome.

name: alejandroadam
text: it isn't it's mostly the county of kern and or inyo a town a few miles from death valley

name: penguinlogick
text:
Dude, I've got some distant family in Kern. They randomly show up at my house sometimes. They kick men's asses.

And they vote.

name: soticoto
text: You're from a long line of desert hermits.

name: alejandroadam
text: psssttt...   the military is involved

name: soticoto
text:
Military desert hermits?
The most dangerous kind.

name: doublebatman
text: I enjoyed how "with out" is two words, but "alittle" is one.

name: ssddr
text: Why is Philippe such a pessimist? Maybe he spends too much time with Beef?

name: slalvation
text: He just has an overdeveloped sense of SHAME

name: waddlerz
text: I think his overactive bladder is affecting his brain.  Poor Philippe

name: mercuri0us
text: Yeah, that and all of the malicious LIES.

name: fakedaisies
text: Yeah, if you lived with Roast Beef the career neurotic and Lie-Bot the career...uh...liar, you'd probably develop a few complexes yourself.

name: chaesar
text: Philippe imagines his golden years to be full of nothing but wet sheets and dead friends.

name: songbirdspectre
text: hehehe. golden years. wet sheets.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: Oh man, that's EXACTLY what my golden years are gonna be like if my grandparents were any indication. This is terrible news.

name: radchillies
text:
I'm pretty sure that is going to be everyone's golden years.

Man, Golden Girls lied to us somethin awful

name: stereo
text:
The truth was right there in the title this whole time !


splut

name: saint
text: if that's all the worse life gets, count me in!

name: snowman
text: Nice Pete looks forward to his golden years being full of nothing but wet sheets and dead friends.

name: andrew_
text: A comment left by andrew_ was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, tttt, dj)

name: epicurus
text:
Philippe's letter is amazing. Did I ever think somehting like this when I was so small? Probably.

I love how he signs the letter "Sigh, Philippe."

name: rowboat
text: And he seems to have learned something from Lyle before he left the old house. He learned maybe the only thing he could have learned from Lyle that would not be an impediment to his living as long as he has. Other than hardly ever working a job.

name: sargasm
text: A comment left by sargasm was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Unfun, twohundredninety, equinn2006, lux, yingkaixing)

name: mckayle
text: He's a hermit in the desert!

name: overmedicated
text: Not subtle!

name: sargasm
text:
I know, what was I thinking

My comment is a bowl of shame eaten with the silver spoon of self-reproach

name: patkun
text:
I wish we got a panel of him yelling at himself.
Maybe someday we will.

name: lizjones
text: I can just imagine him in a little hair shirt, flagellating himself and weeping softly.

name: ttagxamm
text: Might look something like this .

name: shoinan
text: It took a second reading to spot fully that Phillipe is going to have an egg and cheese muffin. This, in itself, is awesome.

name: dasilodavi
text: Suddenly the encouraging things his mother sends seem less ridiculous.  This kid needs positive reinforcement.

name: molesticide
text: good use of a silent penultimate panel.  rarely used well, but here it's golden.

name: soticoto
text: And Philippe's pants in the desert are made of cactus with the thorns still attached... but cactus retains moisture well, so that is alright.

name: tinhand
text: In the last panel, Philippe has been five for over seventy years.

name: zadig
text: Phillipe: he is seventy-five.

name: lux
text: Retract, dude, retract. Phillippe is five .

name: theirateturk
text:
Having made a pee-pee in the bed when I was 15 or so, I know what it is like to deliberate over such a future with great consternation.

:(

name: wittyname
text: Hermitage is your only answer now.

name: tekende
text: Were you ill? There are not many acceptable excuses for that at the age of 15.

name: theirateturk
text: Only God can judge me -.-

name: d-pad
text: This comic inspired me to find a quick way to make egg and cheese muffins. For that, I am grateful.

name: skaterpix
text: Poor Phillipe! Isn't he only 5 though? So he shouldn't worry!

name: nyu
text: I too knew this pain during rush week.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: he feels incredibly terrible about this

name: mikeronomicon
text: Oh, sad Philipe. Don't be a hermit, get a job in porn!

name: aaron_haynes
text: Before it was Fuck You Friday, Fridays were for egg and cheese muffins.

name: aaron_haynes
text: Wait a second I thought otters were lactose intolerant :O

name: ih8jonmayr
text:
Ray Smuckles - Deceased - Plane Crash
Roast Beef - Deceased - Natural causes
Todd - Deceased - OD'd on blow
Pat Reynolds - Still fucking alive.

name: coffeeannan
text: Perhaps Edward Abbey peed his pants as a five-year-old? We may never know.

name: holly_golightly
text:
I enjoy how Philppe laments that he hasn't done this since he was a "little kid". It aligns nicely with how most five year olds view themselves.
Then again, he does seem to come from certain Circumstances, considering his environment involves seeing Lyle daily. Perhaps he really is old beyon his years.

name: holly_golightly
text: Beyond. Damned inability to edit, or type properly in the first place.

name: fourganger
text: SQUEEEEE look at him yawn OMG

name: lolsworth
text: Maybe he just really likes egg and cheese muffins

name: greenkoolayd
text: children are SO emo!

name: sevenslashfour
text: Philippe's shame brings me an amount of joy I am not entirely proud of.

name: alm96
text: Philippe ages?

name: doublebatman
text: The way he signs his diary makes it for me.

name: origotoshi
text: Philippe puts on some sort of wig or head warmer to write in his diary. Must be like Ray's phone jacket.

name: undyingsong
text: Notice the wrinkles under his eyes.
